column4: How do I put movies or video's on a 5th generation Ipod in Rhythmbox media player? Or is there another program I can use?
you could transcode them with something like Handbrake
I have Arista Transcoder to convert the movies, I just want to know how I can put it on a Nano 5th generation ipod. Can I do it through Rhythmbox??? Or would I need another program??
